description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax. ...
full_summary:
# Victoria-Class Submarines Spares Tender Notice

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-231158/A
* **Publication Date**: September 11, 2023
* **Closing Date**: October 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

## Offer Invitation

The Government of Canada's Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of spare parts for the Victoria-Class submarines.

## Items Required

The Department of National Defence requires the following spare parts:

* GSIN: 1045, NSN: 99-9183704, Sleeve Assembly Part No.: L527834, NCAGE: K4744 (Quantity: 4)
* GSIN: 1045, NSN: 99-9183704, Sleeve Assembly Part No.: L527834, NCAGE: K4744 (Quantity: 5)

## Delivery Locations

* CFB Esquimalt
* CFB Halifax

## Selection Criteria

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and the NCAGE they are offering.

## Important Notes

* The RFP documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* The delivery deadline for the required spare parts is fixed at October 23, 2023.

## Additional Information

* Contact Information: Lesley Walker, (000) 000-0000, lesley.walker@forces.gc.ca
* Document Links: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8864/w8482-231158---rfp_0.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8864/w8482-231158---annex-a_0.xlsx

## Tender Classification

This tender is classified under the following codes:

* UNSPSC: 25111701 (Submarines)
* GSIN: 1045 (Sleeve Assemblies)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
